categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This individual was a Padawan of the Ho'Din Jedi Knight Iwo Kulka who served in the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. In 19 BBY, the individual and their master were serving with Republic clone troopers when Contingency Order 66—an order to kill the Jedi—was issued. Declared traitors of the Republic, Master and Padawan were attacked by the clones and the sacrifice of his student allowed Kulka to escape.
The Padawan of Iwo Kulka was briefly mentioned in the novel Dark Lord: The Rise of Darth Vader. Dark Lord was written by James Luceno and released in November 2005.
